page.title: 20ST.CASSIANS CHURCH CHARITIES
page.content: Income from the Elizabeth Pratt charity benefits the vicar, organist and choristers of the parish church. Money towards a Christmas treat for Chaddesley children is provide by the Anna Mills charity. The Michells charity provides income for grave upkeep and general churchyard maintenance. The Chancel Repair Fund income from shares accumulates for repairs on the Chancel. The John Giles charity pays bellringers for an annual muffled peal to be rung on December 17th. the anniversary of his death.
